text: La Voz Senior (Spanish for The Voice Senior) is a Mexican reality talent show that premiered on July 15, 2019 on Azteca Uno. It is based on and part of The Voice franchise created by television producer John de Mol. When TV Azteca the acquired the format of La Voz in 2019 from Televisa, they announced they would also produce La Voz Senior, for elders over 55. ==Coaches and hosts== The first season saw Ricardo Montaner, Belinda, Yahir and Lupillo Rivera as coaches, and Jimena Pérez as host, same as season eight of the adult version. On September 21, 2020, Acunmeyda confirmed María José, as the new senior version coach, replacing Rivera, alongside returning coaches Belinda, Montaner, and Yahir.
